short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to make wide pages slimmer, making lines of text shorter and easier to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes wide pages slimmer, making lines of text shorter and easier to read.

This first version only sets the max-width of the body element to 800px. Source code available at https://github.com/arnemahl/slim-reader
